// A Negative Base Problem
// URL : http://www.codechef.com/problems/ENCD05
#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cstring>
#include <algorithm>

using namespace std;

typedef long long ll;
typedef unsigned long long ull;

string tonegbin(int x)
{
		 string res = "";
		 while(x != 0)
		 {
					if(((int)abs(x)) % 2 == 1)
					{
						  res = "1" + res;
						  x = (x - 1) / -2;
			  		}
			  		else
			  		{
						 res = "0" + res;
						 x /= -2;
			 	  	}
		 }
		 return res;
}

int main()
{
	 int n;
	 while(scanf("%d",&n) > 0)
	 {
					if(n == 0)break;
  				  cout << tonegbin(n) << endl;
	 }
	 system("pause");
	 return 0;
}
